execution_plan.description: Find goods ids that are bakery items.
execution_plan.query: SELECT id AS s1__id FROM goods WHERE food = 'bakery';

execution_plan.description: Find item rows (receipt, item) where the item matches a bakery goods id.
execution_plan.query: SELECT Receipt AS s2__Receipt, Item AS s2__Item FROM items WHERE Item IN ($step1.s1__id);

execution_plan.description: Map receipts that included bakery items to their customers.
execution_plan.query: SELECT ReceiptNumber AS s3__ReceiptNumber, CustomerId AS s3__CustomerId FROM receipts WHERE ReceiptNumber IN ($step2.s2__Receipt);

execution_plan.description: Compute number of distinct bakery-shopping receipts per customer and keep those with more than 10 visits.
execution_plan.query: SELECT CustomerId AS s4__CustomerId, COUNT(DISTINCT ReceiptNumber) AS s4__visit_count FROM receipts WHERE CustomerId IN ($step3.s3__CustomerId) GROUP BY CustomerId HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT ReceiptNumber) > 10;

execution_plan.description: Retrieve last names of customers who have more than 10 bakery visits.
execution_plan.query: SELECT id AS s5__id, lastname AS s5__lastname FROM customers WHERE id IN ($step4.s4__CustomerId);
